Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 245 of 247 404 LBUCmax7
1 this witness, it's about the direct of the next witness; fair to say?
2
3 MS. STERNHEIM: Yes. And there could be redirect that might, in some way, have bearing on this, but I will review it
4 in connection with the direct examination of this witness.
5
6 THE COURT: Okay.
7 MS. MOE: Thank you, your Honor.
8 THE COURT: Thank you for previewing it. We'll take it as it comes. I understand the government's position, I
9 understand Ms. Sternheim's request to evaluate it. It's the specific testimony that comes in on direct of the next witness
10 in light of what happens yet on cross.
11 Anything else?
12
13 MS. MOE: Not from the government, your Honor. Thank you.
14
15 THE COURT: We'll meet again at 8:45. As soon as we have the jury, we'll take up issues, I'll see a briefing, and
16 hopefully we can get resolution and we'll start with the jury as soon as there here. We're adjourned.
17
18 (Adjourned to December 1, 2021 at 8:45 a.m.)
19
20 ***
21
22
23
24
25
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012017
